items.sentence: This is the first time that I\'ve ever disagreed with Tom.
I\'m only going to say this once, so you\'d better listen.
Has it occurred to you that Tom might not want to be here?
What\'s your favorite kind of place to go on a first date?
Some people will never understand why this should be done.
I suggested to Tom the possibility that he work with Mary.
I wondered whether or not Tom thought Mary had to do that.
How difficult was it for you to find a job here in Boston?
I can\'t remember the last time I did something like this.
Tom has recently been diagnosed with rheumatoid arthritis.
